fields.label: USE AN H1
fields.message: This template is meant to give the editor complete design control (using Visual Composer, etc). If you are using this template, you'll need/want to manually use an h1 somewhere in your content.

fields.label: Include Default Page Header?
fields.name: default_global_header
fields.instructions: can still be overwritten at the page level

fields.label: Page Header Background Color
fields.name: page_header_bg_color
fields.instructions: This is a global setting. You can override this at the page level.

fields.label: Page Header Height
fields.name: page_header_height
fields.instructions: in pixels...do not include "px"

fields.label: Page Header Text Width
fields.name: page_header_text_width
fields.instructions: in percentage (%) or pixels (px) i.e. 35% or 200px

fields.label: Page Header Text Color
fields.name: page_header_text_color
fields.instructions: This value is for solid color backgrounds only. If you use an image as your background, the text will default as white or as assigned in the editor.

fields.label: Page Header Center Text?
fields.name: page_header_center_text
fields.instructions: This will override all above positioning values. Centers horizontally and vertically within banner.

fields.label: Page Header Text Space from Top
fields.name: page_header_text_space_from_top
fields.instructions:
must use percentage (%) or pixels (px) i.e. 35% or 200px
This is a global setting. You can override this at the page level.

fields.label: Page Header Text Space from Left
fields.name: page_header_text_space_from_left
fields.instructions:
must use percentage (%) or pixels (px) i.e. 35% or 200px
This is a global setting. You can override this at the page level.

fields.label: Include Default Page Footer?
fields.name: default_global_footer
fields.instructions: can still be overwritten at the page level

fields.label: Page Footer Background Color
fields.name: page_footer_background_color
fields.instructions: This is a global setting. You can override this at the page level.

fields.label: Page Footer Height
fields.name: page_footer_height
fields.instructions: in pixels...do not include "px"

fields.label: Page Footer Text Width
fields.name: page_footer_text_width
fields.instructions: in percentage (%) or pixels (px) i.e. 35% or 200px

fields.label: Page Footer Text Color
fields.name: page_footer_text_color
fields.instructions: This value is for solid color backgrounds only. If you use an image as your background, the text will default as white or as assigned in the editor.

fields.label: Page Footer Center Text?
fields.name: page_footer_center_text
fields.instructions: This will override all above positioning values. Centers horizontally and vertically within banner.

fields.label: Page Footer Text Space from Top
fields.name: page_footer_text_space_from_top
fields.instructions:
must use percentage (%) or pixels (px) i.e. 35% or 200px
This is a global setting. You can override this at the page level.

fields.label: Page Footer Text Space from Left
fields.name: page_footer_text_space_from_left
fields.instructions:
must use percentage (%) or pixels (px) i.e. 35% or 200px
This is a global setting. You can override this at the page level.

fields.label: Footer Note
fields.message: IMPORTANT! You can set global values in "Global Info" section

fields.label: Footer Height
fields.name: footer_height
fields.instructions: in pixels...do not include "px"

fields.label: Footer Text
fields.name: footer_text
fields.instructions: If you use an h1 tag in this box, the page title, which is the h1 for the page, will not display in the content area.

fields.label: Footer Text Width
fields.name: footer_text_width
fields.instructions: in percentage (%) or pixels (px)

fields.label: Center Banner Text?
fields.name: footer_center_banner_text
fields.instructions: This will override all above positioning values. Centers horizontally and vertically within banner.

fields.label: Space from Top
fields.name: footer_space_from_top
fields.instructions: must use percentage (%) or pixels (px) i.e. 35% or 200px

fields.label: Space from Left
fields.name: footer_space_from_left
fields.instructions: must use percentage (%) or pixels (px) i.e. 35% or 200px

fields.label: Header Note
fields.message: IMPORTANT! You can set global values in "Global Info" section

fields.label: Header Height
fields.name: header_height
fields.instructions: in pixels...do not include "px"

fields.label: Header Text
fields.name: header_text
fields.instructions: If you use an h1 tag in this box, the page title, which is the h1 for the page, will not display in the content area.

fields.label: Header Text Width
fields.name: header_text_width
fields.instructions: in percentage (%) or pixels (px)

fields.label: Center Banner Text?
fields.name: center_banner_text
fields.instructions: This will override all above positioning values. Centers horizontally and vertically within banner.

fields.label: Space from Top
fields.name: space_from_top
fields.instructions: must use percentage (%) or pixels (px) i.e. 35% or 200px

fields.label: Space from Left
fields.name: space_from_left
fields.instructions: must use percentage (%) or pixels (px) i.e. 35% or 200px
